sentences.en: The US dollar spiked to a three-month high.
sentences.cn: 美元猛然升值到三个月来的最高价。

sentences.en: The Patriotic Front took power after a three-month civil war.
sentences.cn: 爱国阵线经过3个月的内战后夺取了政权。

sentences.en: There would be a three-month delay while the deal would be put on ice.
sentences.cn: 会有3个月的延误，与此同时这笔交易也将暂时搁置。
